alert.note: Alert for Garland; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:16PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Garland and central Hot Spring Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 216 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hot Springs to near Meyers. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Lofton... Rockwell... Hot Springs National Park... Red Oak... Oaklawn Racetrack... Sunshine... Lake Catherine State Park... Gulpha Gorge... Pettyview... Hempwallace... Pearcy... Royal... Point Cedar... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
